description.value:
+5 to all Dodge and Parry Tests Medals can't be acquired, only earned, benefit applied to the whole squad. Looks Like a row of three skulls

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Awarded to the survivors of a unit who suffered over 2/3rds casualties.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
